fields.body_data: {"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei der Quelltext:","type":"text"},{"content":"def func(a = 5, b = 7):\n print a, b","type":"source"},{"content":"Ergänzen Sie die von folgenden Funktionsaufrufen erzeugten Ausgaben","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"func()","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"5 7","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"func(3)","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"3 7","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"func(3, 'test')","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"3 test","type":"text"}},{"content":"Hinweis: siehe Kurs02 (Funktionen)","type":"text"}]}
fields.title: Funktions-Aufrufe
fields.author: Pit Garbe

fields.body_data:

b=1

","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"a=10
b=1
a=str(a)
b=str(b)","type":"source"}},{"content":"print a + b # -> 101","type":"source"}]}

fields.body_data: {"segments":[{"content":"Ergänzen Sie jeweils das Ergebnis folgender Code-Zeilen.\n\nHinweise: Beispiel-Liste: [8,9,10], Beispiel-String: \"xyz\" (inkl. Anführungszeichen)","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"range(3)","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"[0,1,2]","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"Hallo Welt\"[1]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"a\"","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"Hallo Welt\"[:4]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"Hall\"","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"Hallo Welt\"[-3]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"e\"","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"Hallo Welt\"[-3:]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"elt\"","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"Hallo Welt\"[1:5]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"allo\"","type":"source"}}]}

fields.body_data: {"segments":[{"content":"Ergänzen sie jeweils das Ergebnis folgender Code-Zeilen (ohne Leerzeichen).\n\nHinweise: Beispiel-Liste: [8,9,10], Beispiel-String: \"Hallo Welt\", Beispiel-Bool: False","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"[1,5]*3","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"[1,5,1,5,1,5]","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"\"-\"*3","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"\"---\"","type":"source"}},{"type":"check","content":[{"content":"\"abc\" == 'abc'","type":"text"}],"solution":true},{"type":"check","content":[{"content":"8 in range(10)","type":"text"}],"solution":true},{"type":"check","content":[{"content":"\"all\" in 'Hallo'","type":"text"}],"solution":true},{"type":"check","content":[{"content":"\"g\" not in \"[a-z]\"","type":"text"}],"solution":true}]}

fields.body_data: {"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei folgender Quellcode:","type":"text"},{"content":"x = 5\ny = 2\ny2 = 2.0","type":"source"},{"content":"Gegeben Sie das jeweils den Inhalt von <tt>z</tt> nach der Ausführung folgender Anweisungen an!","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = x*y","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"10","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = x/y # Achtung: Ganzzahldivision","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"2","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = x/y2","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"2.5","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = x**y","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"25","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = (x+y)*y2","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"14.0","type":"text"}}]}
fields.title: Rechenoperationen
fields.author: Pit Garbe

fields.body_data: {"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei folgender Quellcode:","type":"text"},{"content":"import sympy as sp\na = 365\nA, B, C = 3, 4, 5","type":"source"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"Legen Sie ein Symbol namens 'x' in einer Variable namens 'x_symb' an.","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"x_symb = sp.Symbol('x')","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"Legen Sie in einer Anweisung drei Symbole namens 'i', 'j', 'k' in gleichnamigen Variablen an.","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"i, j, k = sp.symbols('i j k')","type":"source"}}]}
fields.title: Symbole anlegen
fields.author: Pit Garbe

fields.body_data:
{"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei folgender Quellcode:","type":"text"},{"content":"import sympy as sp
from sympy import sin, cos
a, x, y = sp.symbols('a x y')","type":"source"},{"content":"Vervollständingen Sie jeweils die Code-Zeile so, dass die Ausgabe mit dem Kommentar übereinstimmt.
(Die Sterne sind zu ersetzen!)","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"r = a*(x+y)
r2 = sp.******(r)
print r2 # a*x + a*y","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"r = a*(x+y)
r2 = sp.expand(r)
print r2 # a*x + a*y","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"r = sin(y)**2 + cos(y)**2
r2 = sp.******(r)
print r2 # 1","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"r = sin(y)**2 + cos(y)**2
r2 = sp.trigsimp(r)
print r2 # 1","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"r = 5*x**3 + 7*x -a
r2 = sp.****(***)
# Ableitung:
print r2 # 15*x**2 + 7","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"r = 5*x**3 + 7*x -a
r2 = sp.diff(r,x)
# Ableitung:
print r2 # 15*x**2 + 7","type":"source"}}]}
fields.title: Sympy Grundfunktionalität
fields.author: Pit Garbe

fields.body_data:
{"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei folgender Quellcode:","type":"text"},{"content":"import sympy as sp
a, b, c, x = sp.symbols('a b c x')
r =  a*x**b + c","type":"source"},{"content":"Ersetzen Sie zunächst im Ausdruck <tt>r</tt> die Variable <tt>c</tt> durch den Wert 7.
Ersetzen Sie danach im Ausdruck <tt>r</tt> die Variablen <tt>a, b, c</tt> durch die Werte 7, 8 bzw 9.
(Liste von Tupeln, kein Dictionary)","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"r2  = r.****","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"r2 = r.subs(c, 7)","type":"source"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"","type":"text"}],"answer":{"content":"r3  = r.****","type":"source"},"solution":{"content":"r3 = r.subs([(a, 7), (b, 8), (c, 9)])","type":"source"}}]}
fields.title: Sympy Substitution
fields.author: Pit Garbe

fields.body_data:
{"segments":[{"content":"Gegeben sei folgender Quellcode:","type":"text"},{"content":"import numpy as np
a = np.arange(5)
b = np.linspace(-3, 3, 12)
c = np.eye(50)
d = a[:-1].reshape((2,2))","type":"source"},{"content":"Geben Sie jeweils den Wert der Variablen <tt>z</tt> in folgenden Fällen an.","type":"text"},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = len(a)","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"5","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = b.shape # Tupel der Länge 1","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"(1,)","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"x = a*3; z = x[3]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"9","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = c.shape","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"(50, 50)","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = c[0,0]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"1","type":"text"}},{"type":"input","content":[{"content":"z = d[-1,0]","type":"source"}],"answer":{"content":"","type":"text"},"solution":{"content":"2","type":"text"}}]}
fields.title: Numpy Arrays
fields.author: Pit Garbe
